data.name: saleReport.ReportResourceString
data.value:
﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Report ScriptLanguage="Vb" ReportInfo.Created="05/19/2018 16:18:52" ReportInfo.Modified="05/20/2018 14:49:02" ReportInfo.CreatorVersion="2018.3.1.0"> <Dictionary> <OdbcDataConnection Name="Connection" ConnectionString="rijcmlqDsfwzqmpop0DqfGfr49Br1BEBRTg6bCmgJFsVfVGp0qFPEObhd3hT7IFAJw4XsqVYmk56fnGKrcLO+UpGfNk7yovZ1WDCE4n41hnLNhwI3zE0lzaeSyPxnMfoddZckCl"> <TableDataSource Name="Table" Alias="Software" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 chosensoftware.BasketID,
 chosensoftware.SoftwareQuantity,
 software.SoftwareName,
 software.SoftwareCost
FROM chosensoftware
 INNER JOIN software
 ON chosensoftware.SoftwareID = software.SoftwareID"> <Column Name="SoftwareQuantity" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="SoftwareName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="SoftwareCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table1" Alias="AdditionalServices" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 chosenadditionalservices.BasketID,
 additionalservices.AdditionalServiceName,
 additionalservices.AdditionalServiceCost
FROM chosenadditionalservices
 INNER JOIN additionalservices
 ON chosenadditionalservices.AdditionalServiceID = additionalservices.AdditionalServiceID"> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="AdditionalServiceName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="AdditionalServiceCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table2" Alias="Components" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 goodscatalog.GoodsName,
 goodscatalog.GoodsCost,
 goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerName,
 componentslist.BasketID,
 componentslist.GoodsQuantity
FROM goodscatalog
 INNER JOIN goodsmanufacturer
 ON goodscatalog.GoodsManufacturerID = goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerID
 INNER JOIN componentslist
 ON componentslist.GoodsID = goodscatalog.GoodsID"> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="GoodsQuantity" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="GoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> <Column Name="GoodsManufacturerName" DataType="System.String"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table3" Alias="ServiceMaintenance" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 chosenservicemaintenance.BasketID,
 servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceName,
 servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceCost
FROM chosenservicemaintenance
 INNER JOIN servicemaintenance
 ON chosenservicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceID = servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceID"> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="ServiceMaintenanceName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="ServiceMaintenanceCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> </OdbcDataConnection> <Parameter Name="basketID" DataType="System.Int32" Expression="3"/> <Parameter Name="TotalCost" DataType="FastReport.Variant" Expression="[TotalSoftware] + [TotalAdditionalServices] + [TotalComponents] + [TotalServiceMaintenance]"/> <Parameter Name="SoftwareTotalCost" DataType="System.Decimal" Expression="[Software.SoftwareQuantity] * [Software.SoftwareCost]"/> <Parameter Name="ComponentsTotalCost" DataType="System.Decimal" Expression="[Components.GoodsQuantity] * [Components.GoodsCost]"/> <Parameter Name="clientName" DataType="System.String"/> <Parameter Name="workerName" DataType="System.String"/> <Parameter Name="paymentMethod" DataType="System.String"/> <Parameter Name="totalCount" DataType="FastReport.Variant" Expression="[SoftwareCount] + [AdditionalServicesCount] + [ComponentsCount] + [ServiceMaintenanceCount]"/> <Parameter Name="saleDate" DataType="System.DateTime"/> <Total Name="TotalSoftware" Expression="[Software.SoftwareQuantity] * [Software.SoftwareCost]" Evaluator="Data1"/> <Total Name="TotalAdditionalServices" Expression="[AdditionalServices.AdditionalServiceCost]" Evaluator="Data2"/> <Total Name="TotalComponents" Expression="[Components.GoodsQuantity] * [Components.GoodsCost]" Evaluator="Data3"/> <Total Name="TotalServiceMaintenance" Expression="[ServiceMaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceCost]" Evaluator="Data4"/> <Total Name="SoftwareCount" TotalType="Count" Evaluator="Data1"/> <Total Name="AdditionalServicesCount" TotalType="Count" Evaluator="Data2"/> <Total Name="ComponentsCount" TotalType="Count" Evaluator="Data3"/> <Total Name="ServiceMaintenanceCount" TotalType="Count" Evaluator="Data4"/> </Dictionary> <ReportPage Name="Page1"> <ReportTitleBand Name="ReportTitle1" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text5" Left="236.25" Top="9.45" Width="245.7" Height="28.35" Text="Товарный чек" HorzAlign="Center" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 16pt, style=Bold"/> </ReportTitleBand> <PageHeaderBand Name="PageHeader1" Top="49.54" Width="718.2" Height="207.9"> <TextObject Name="Text17" Top="170.1" Width="718.2" Height="28.35" Fill.Color="DarkGray"/> <TextObject Name="Text7" Top="170.1" Width="481.95" Height="28.35" Text="Наименование" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text9" Left="481.95" Top="170.1" Width="75.6" Height="28.35" Text="Цена" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, Name="Data1" Top="259.72" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" DataSource="Table" Filter="[Software.BasketID] = [basketID]"> <TextObject Name="Text1" Top="9.45" Width="481.95" Height="18.9" Text="[Software.SoftwareName]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text2" Left="557.55" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="18.9" Text="[Software.SoftwareQuantity]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject
